scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: ASTRA is a girls' club sponsored by Altrusa. Local ASTRA clubs are sponsored by corresponding local Altrusa clubs. These papers contain the guidelines for forming a ASTRA club in a local community, the bylaws and policies, as well as containing copies of officer and member nomination forms. Also includes a laminated news-clipping from the local Lexington newspaper.
